examples: The craftsman slowly examines the bowl, turning it gently in his weathered hands. His eyes reflect years of wisdom. Subtle smile forms on his face. Dust particles drift in warm light. Breathing motion, blinking eyes.
prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Text prompt for video generation. Either prompt or multi_prompt must be provided, but not both.

aspect_ratio.title: Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the generated video frame

duration.description: The duration of the generated video in seconds
duration.title: Duration

generate_audio.title: Generate Audio
generate_audio.description: Whether to generate native audio for the video. Supports Chinese and English voice output. Other languages are automatically translated to English. For English speech, use lowercase letters; for acronyms or proper nouns, use uppercase.

multi_prompt.title: Multi Prompt
multi_prompt.description: List of prompts for multi-shot video generation. If provided, divides the video into multiple shots.

elements.title: Elements
elements.description: Elements (characters/objects) to include in the video. Each example can either be an image set (frontal + reference images) or a video. Reference in prompt as @Element1, @Element2, etc.

voice_ids.title: Voice Ids
voice_ids.description: Optional Voice IDs for video generation. Reference voices in your prompt with <<<voice_1>>> and <<<voice_2>>> (maximum 2 voices per task). Get voice IDs from the kling video create-voice endpoint: https://fal.ai/models/fal-ai/kling-video/create-voice

shot_type.title: Shot Type
shot_type.description: The type of multi-shot video generation. Required when multi_prompt is provided.

start_image_url.description: URL of the image to be used for the video
start_image_url.title: Start Image Url
start_image_url.limit_description: Max file size: 10.0MB, Min width: 300px, Min height: 300px, Min aspect ratio: 0.40, Max aspect ratio: 2.50, Timeout: 20.0s

anyOf.limit_description: Max file size: 10.0MB, Min width: 300px, Min height: 300px, Min aspect ratio: 0.40, Max aspect ratio: 2.50, Timeout: 20.0s

end_image_url.title: End Image Url
end_image_url.description: URL of the image to be used for the end of the video

cfg_scale.title: Cfg Scale
cfg_scale.description:
The CFG (Classifier Free Guidance) scale is a measure of how close you want
            the model to stick to your prompt.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The duration of this shot in seconds

anyOf.limit_description: Max file size: 200.0MB, Min width: 720px, Min height: 720px, Max width: 2160px, Max height: 2160px, Min duration: 3.0s, Max duration: 10.05s, Min FPS: 24.0, Max FPS: 60.0, Timeout: 30.0s

video_url.title: Video Url
video_url.description: The video URL of the element. A request can only have one element with a video.

items.limit_description: Max file size: 10.0MB, Min width: 300px, Min height: 300px, Min aspect ratio: 0.40, Max aspect ratio: 2.50, Timeout: 20.0s

reference_image_urls.title: Reference Image Urls
reference_image_urls.description: Additional reference images from different angles. 1-3 images supported. At least one image is required.

anyOf.limit_description: Max file size: 10.0MB, Min width: 300px, Min height: 300px, Min aspect ratio: 0.40, Max aspect ratio: 2.50, Timeout: 20.0s

frontal_image_url.title: Frontal Image Url
frontal_image_url.description: The frontal image of the element (main view).

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The mime type of the file.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
